item.title: Access resources on a remote server with Wireguard
item.description: Access resources on a remote server with Wireguard # Introduction # I self-host a few apps on my home network, using a small single-board computer as my server. Until recently, I was only able to access my self-hosted apps at home, on my home network. That limitation was inconvenient, to say the least. For example, one of the apps I self-host is Actual, an open-source budgeting app that totally changed the way I manage my personal finances.
